prod_short_desc: Play all day on a 3-in-1 Poolside Holiday!
prod_long_desc:
Enjoy a wealth of summer activities with the Poolside Holiday set, featuring a house with a red and tan color scheme, rooftop terrace with flowers and barbecue, and a garden area with trees, greenery, swimming pool and a table tennis table with rackets. Interior details include a guitar amplifier, flat-screen TV and a sofa. Mix and match the buildable modules to create a rooftop pool or a rooftop garden, and easily swap the window, door and other modular sections to customize the house with the new-for-June-2017 LEGO® Creator modular system. Combine this set with the 31068 and 31069 modular-system sets to create a dream house with endless build and play opportunities! This 3‑in‑1 LEGO Creator model can also be rebuilt to create a Skate Park Holiday or a Music Garage Holiday. Includes 2 minifigures.
Build a colorful vacation house with a rooftop terrace and barbecue, a garden area with fountain, a swimming pool, a table-tennis table, and modular sections for customization!
3-in-1 model: Rebuild it into a Skate Park Holiday or a Music Garage Holiday
Includes male teen and female child minifigures
LEGO Creator building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building
Poolside Holiday is over 4” high, 7” wide, and 5” long. Skate Park Holiday is over 5” high, 6” wide, and 4” long. Music Garage Holiday is over 5” high, 5” wide, and 4” long
356 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 7 and 12 years old
